  • CV

    Guanyi Chen

    I am a PhD Candidate at Utrecht University, working on Natural Language Generation. I am supervised by Prof. Kees van Deemter and Dr. Chenghua Lin.

    • Utrecht, Netherlands
    • Utrecht University
    • Email
    • Facebook
    • LinkedIn

      [pdf]

    2019

    1. A Dual-Attention Hierarchical Recurrent Neural Network for Dialogue Act Classification
      Li R., Lin C., Collinson M., Li X., and Chen G.
      CoNLL 2019, Hong Kong, China
      [pdf] [BibTex]

      Chen G., van Deemter K., Pagliaro S., Smalbil L., and Lin C.

      [pdf] [BibTex]

      Chen G., van Deemter K., and Lin C.
      INLG 2019, Tokyo
      [pdf] [BibTex]
